knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

#Load Proper Packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

#Download Files from UNIX Assignment

```{r}
fang_et_al <- read.delim("https://github.com/EEOB-BioData/BCB546_Spring2023/blob/main/assignments/UNIX_Assignment/fang_et_al_genotypes.txt?raw=true", header = TRUE, sep = "\t")


snp_position <- read.delim("https://github.com/EEOB-BioData/BCB546_Spring2023/raw/main/assignments/UNIX_Assignment/snp_position.txt", header = TRUE, sep = "\t")
```

#Data Inspection of Initial Files
```{r}
dim(fang_et_al)
dim(snp_position)
#dimensions include number of columns and number of lines
```

#Preparation for downstream analysis
```{r}
transposed_fang_et_al <- as.data.frame(t(fang_et_al))
transposed_fang_et_al <- transposed_fang_et_al %>% rownames_to_column(var="Sample_ID")
names(transposed_fang_et_al) <- transposed_fang_et_al[1,]
transposed_fang_et_al <- transposed_fang_et_al[-1,]
#should transpose fang_et_al and preserve proper names

dim.data.frame(transposed_fang_et_al)
#checks results of transposition

snp_position_trimmed <- snp_position[,c(1,3,4)]
#pulled three columns from snp_position

view(transposed_fang_et_al)
view(snp_position_trimmed)

names(transposed_fang_et_al)[names(transposed_fang_et_al) == 'Sample_ID'] <- 'SNP_ID'
#Renames Sample_ID in fang_et_al to SNP_ID for merging with snp_positions

combined_snp_genotype_data <- inner_join(snp_position_trimmed,transposed_fang_et_al, by = "SNP_ID")

view(combined_snp_genotype_data)
```
